```pddl
[
(:action select
    ; Select a resource and update its state
    :parameters (?entity - agent ?resource - object ?subresource - sub_object)
    :precondition (and (at ?entity ?location) (unselected ?resource) (or (unselected ?subresource) (selected ?resource)))
    :effect (and 
        (selected ?entity ?resource) 
        (not (unselected ?resource))
    )
),

(:action name_character
    :parameters (?p - agent ?name - character_name)
    :precondition (and (selected ?p ?part) (nameless ?p))
    :effect (and (named ?p ?name) (not (nameless ?p)))
),

(:action name
    ; Name an entity and update its status
    :parameters (?entity - agent ?identifier - identifier)
    :precondition (and (selected ?entity ?selection_criteria) (nameless ?entity))
    :effect (and (named ?entity ?identifier) (not (nameless ?entity)))
),

(:action enter
    :parameters (?p - agent ?entity - object ?state - state)
    :precondition (and (saved ?p) (not (in_state ?p ?state)))
    :effect (and (in_state ?p ?state) (state_changed ?entity))
)
]
```
